### Declared Paid Losses
This table shows the amount of Paid Losses by Date of Loss as declared in various Claims Bordereaux since the inception of the contract in September 2014.

```{r,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
Ramayana_Claim_List_updated_14_Dec_2017_AAHE_ <- read_excel("D:/Users/user/Dropbox/AIH Underwriting/Hannover Re/Ramayana/Claims/Ramayana Claim List updated 14 Dec 2017 (AAHE).xlsx", 
                                                            sheet = "Sheet1")
ROE <- c(13375,1,10073,16278)
claims1217 <- as.tibble(Ramayana_Claim_List_updated_14_Dec_2017_AAHE_)
claims1217$Total__2 <- as.numeric(claims1217$Total__2)
claims1217 <- claims1217%>%
  arrange(desc(Total))%>%
  select(`Date of Loss`,`Claim No.`,Assured,Total,Total__1,Total__2)%>%
  dplyr::rename(DOL=`Date of Loss`,Claim=`Claim No.`, IDR=`Total`,USD=`Total__1`,SGD=`Total__2`)
PaidIDR <- claims1217%>%
  arrange(desc(IDR))%>%
  filter(IDR!=0)%>%
  select(DOL,Claim,Assured, IDR)%>%
  group_by(DOL)%>%
  dplyr::summarise(Paid=sum(IDR))%>%
  arrange(desc(Paid))%>%
  mutate(Status="Paid",EQU=round(Paid*ROE[2]), CURR="IDR")
PaidUSD <- claims1217%>%
  arrange(desc(USD))%>%
  filter(USD!=0)%>%
  select(DOL,Claim,Assured, USD)%>%
  group_by(DOL)%>%
  dplyr::summarise(Paid=sum(USD))%>%
  arrange(desc(Paid))%>%
  mutate(Status="Paid", EQU=round(Paid*ROE[1]), CURR="USD")
PaidSGD <- claims1217%>%
  arrange(desc(SGD))%>%
  filter(SGD!=0)%>%
  select(DOL,Claim,Assured, SGD)%>%
  group_by(DOL)%>%
  dplyr::summarise(Paid=sum(SGD))%>%
  mutate(Status="Paid", EQU=round(Paid*ROE[3]), CURR="SGD")
Paid <- rbind(PaidIDR,PaidUSD,PaidSGD)
Paid1217 <- Paid%>%
  select(DOL,EQU)%>%
  group_by(DOL)%>%
  dplyr::summarise("2017-12-14"=round(sum(EQU)))
Paid1217$DOL <- as.Date(Paid1217$DOL)
```

This table shows the Aggregate Paid Losses  as declared in various Claims Bordereaux since the inception of the contract in September 2014.


```{r,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}    
agglosses <- compare[,-1]
agglosses <- t(colSums(agglosses))
    agglosses%>%kable("html", escape = F)%>%
              kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped","hover","condensed"), font_size = 10, full_width = F, position = "center") %>%
       add_header_above(c("Claims Bordereaux Date"=10))
```

This table shows the development of Paid Losses by Date of Loss as declared in various Claims Bordereaux since the inception of the contract in September 2014.

```{r,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
difference <- compare%>%
  transmute(DOL=DOL,
            change=round(`2016-04-01`)-round(`2016-02-22`),
            change1=round(`2016-05-18`)-round(`2016-04-01`),
            change2=round(`2016-08-12`)-round(`2016-05-18`),
            change3=round(`2016-12-05`)-round(`2016-08-12`),
            change4=round(`2017-06-21`)-round(`2016-12-05`),
            change5=round(`2017-09-18`)-round(`2017-06-21`),
            change6=round(`2017-12-14`)-round(`2017-09-18`),
            change7=round(`2018-01-09`)-round(`2017-12-14`),
            change8=round(`2018-02-15`)-round(`2018-01-09`),
            cumulative=round(`2018-02-15`)-round(`2016-02-22`))%>%
  arrange(DOL)
  difference%>%kable("html")%>%
    kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped","hover","condensed"), font_size = 10, full_width = F, position = "center") %>%
       add_header_above(c(" "=1,"Movement in Paid Amount since Prior Bordereau"=9," "=1))


```
